title: Morning news headlines: Worried TalkTalk customers await cyber attack ... - IcNorthWales
text:
Morning news headlines: Worried TalkTalk customers await cyber attack damage report, Gove blocks open prison move for road rage killer Kenneth Noye Logo of the telecoms giant TalkTalk. Millions of people could have had their credit card and bank details stolen after a "significant and sustained cyber attack" on the company's website Millions of people could have had their credit card and bank details stolen after a "significant and sustained cyber attack" on TalkTalk's website.
 IcNorthWales.
